name.description: This is used to show the name of the extension in the form of vendor/cleanname.

type.description: Should always be phpbb3-extension for extensions.

version.description: Package version, see full specification for more info on valid schemes.

time.description: Package release date, in 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format.

license.description: License name. Or an array of license names.

authors.description: List of authors that contributed to the package. This is typically the main maintainers, not the full list.

type.description: It should show their position and if they are a past contributor it should be prefixed by the word past.

require.description: This is a hash of package name (keys) and version constraints (values) that are required to run this package.

phpBB.description: This is the phpBB Version it requires, it should be a singluar version and not contain any operators

php.description: This is the PHP Version it requires, this can include operators. For more information on the format see the full specification

extra.description: Extra data used by phpBB but is not in composer.json

display-name.description: This is the human display name for your extension
